title: The Incredible Hercules, Vol. 1: Against the World
description: In the wake of World War Hulk, The Mighty Avengers are hot on the heels of unrepentant renegades Hercules and Amadeus Cho. Driven into a mindless berserker rage by Ares, Herc has become the critical piece of Cho's plan to utterly destroy S.H.I.E.L.D. What is Cho's master plan to wipe out the spy agency...and is he willing to get Herc killed to do it? Guest-starring the Champions of Los Angeles! Yes, seriously!Collecting: The Incredible Hercules 112-115, Hulk vs. Hercules: When Titans Collide
author: Greg Pak
